IFWEnumParams Interface Reference
[Common Interfaces]

import "common.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IFWEnumParams:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Object Creation Enumeration Object.

Use this object to query for parameters while creating an object. An instance of this class may only be created with IFWCreateContext::EnumParams. This class is exempt from FreeWill+ standard error scheme. QueryXXXX functions return HRESULT codes but do not raise errors. This is useful if some errors should be ignored, for example in case of optional parameters. The client module should identify serious errors and raise them using IFWEnumParams::ErrorEx, a specialised error function that provides nore detailed diagnostics.

Definition at line 865 of file common.idl.

HRESULT QueryParam ([out] FWPARAM **pParam)
 Generic Query function: queries for the FWPARAM value at current handle position and increments the handle pos if successful.

 Queries for a FWULONG parameter at the current handle position and increments the handle pos if successful.

HRESULT Skip ([in] FWLONG nNum)
 Skips over the next specified number of entries in the params sequence.

HRESULT Reset ()
 Resets to the beginning of the enumeration sequence.

HRESULT Clone ([out] IFWEnumParams **ppEnum)
 Creates another enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the current one.

HRESULT ErrorEx (FWSTRING pSrcFile, FWULONG nSrcLine, HRESULT h)
 Specialised version of IFWUnknown::Error which provides a more detailed message for errors generated by QueryXxxx functions.
